DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare Connective Tissue Motion Measure ( CTMM ) low back pain no-low back pain subject , evaluate reliability CTMM , examine correlation CTMM low back pain symptom , disability , functional measure . The investigator hypothesize CTMM reduce , average , low back pain subject , CTMM reliable intra-class correlation great 0.8 , CTMM negatively correlate low back pain symptom , disability functional measure .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria subject : able stand walk without assistance able read understand English able understand sign consent form Inclusion Criteria low back pain subject : history recurrent chronic low back pain Inclusion criterion nolow back pain subject : history low back pain chronic pain limited activity daily live work numerical chronic pain index le 0.5 Exclusion Criteria subject : previous severe back low extremity injury surgery major structural spinal deformity ( scoliosis , kyphosis , stenosis ) ankylose spondylitis rheumatoid arthritis neurological deficit ( weakness sensory loss , decrease deep tendon reflex suggest nerve root compression , subjective symptom nerve root irritation ( sciatica ) ) radicular pain neurological major psychiatric disorder bleed disorder corticosteroid anticoagulant medication substance abuse pregnancy active worker 's compensation disability case litigation low back pain problem acute systemic infection
